name: mongodb-memory-server
description: mongodb server for testing (auto-download latest version). the server will allow you to connect your favourite odm or client library to the mongodb server and run parallel integration tests isolated from each other.
kwds: mongodb server for testing (auto-download latest version). the server will allow you to connect your favourite odm or client library to the mongodb server and run parallel integration tests isolated from each other. mongodb mongoose mock stub mockgoose mongodb-prebuilt mongomem
